titleStmt.title: A letter of spirituall advice written to Mr. Stephen Marshall in his sicknesse by one of his brethren in the clergy, Mart. I, M DC XLIII.
titleStmt.author: One of his brethren in the clergy.
Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.

notesStmt.note: An attack on Marshall's Presbyterian views.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
